concept.description: Adds a label 'Changed' to all Git files that have been changed in the last Git commit.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Branch:Current)-[:HAS_HEAD]->(:Commit)-[:CONTAINS_CHANGE]->()-[:MODIFIES]->(sourceFile:File) WHERE sourceFile.relativePath ends with ".java" SET sourceFile:Changed

concept.description: Adds a label 'Changed' to all Java types that have been changed in the last Git commit.
concept.cypher: MATCH (sourceFile:Git:File:Changed) WHERE sourceFile.relativePath ends with ".java" WITH sourceFile MATCH (package:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(changedType:Type) WHERE sourceFile.relativePath ends with (package.fileName + "/" + changedType.sourceFileName) SET changedType:Changed RETURN changedType

concept.description: Adds a label 'Affected' to all test classes having a dependency to Java types which were changed in the last Git commit.
concept.cypher: MATCH hierarchy=shortestPath((changedType:Type:Changed)-[:EXTENDS|IMPLEMENTS*0..]-(type:Type)) WITH type, hierarchy WHERE all(t in nodes(hierarchy) WHERE (:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(t)) WITH type MATCH (testArtifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(testPackage:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(test:Class), (test)-[:EXTENDS|IMPLEMENTS*0..]->(:Test:Class)-[:DEPENDS_ON*0..1]->(type:Type) WHERE NOT (exists(test.abstract) and test.abstract) SET test:Affected RETURN testArtifact as Artifact, collect(distinct test) as Tests

concept.description: Reports all test classes affected by the last Git commit.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Maven:Project)-[:CREATES]->(artifact:Artifact) OPTIONAL MATCH (artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(test:Affected:Test) RETURN artifact as Artifact, collect(test) as Tests

concept.description: Adds a label 'Base' to all commits with more than one child commits (i.e. commits where a branch is split off).
concept.cypher: MATCH (child:Commit)-[p:HAS_PARENT]->(branchBase:Commit) WITH branchBase, count(child) as children WHERE children > 1 SET branchBase:Base RETURN branchBase as Base, children as Children

concept.description: Adds a label 'Changed' to Git files that changed in the current branch.
concept.cypher: MATCH (branch:Branch:Current)-[:HAS_HEAD]->(branchHead:Commit), branchHistory=shortestPath((base:Commit:Base)<-[:HAS_PARENT*]-(branchHead)) WHERE branchHead <> base WITH base, branchHistory MATCH (baseBranch:Branch)-[:HAS_HEAD]->(baseHead:Commit), baseHistory=shortestPath((base)<-[:HAS_PARENT*]-(baseHead)) WHERE baseBranch.name ends with {testImpactAnalysisGitBaseBranch} and baseHead <> base WITH branchHistory LIMIT 1 UNWIND nodes(branchHistory) as commit WITH commit MATCH (commit)-[:CONTAINS_CHANGE]->()-[:MODIFIES]->(sourceFile:File) SET sourceFile:Changed RETURN commit.sha, collect(sourceFile.relativePath)

concept.description: Adds a label 'Changed' to Java types that changed in the current branch.
concept.cypher: MATCH (sourceFile:File:Changed) WHERE sourceFile.relativePath ends with ".java" WITH sourceFile MATCH (package:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(changedType:Type) WHERE sourceFile.relativePath ends with (package.fileName + "/" + changedType.sourceFileName) SET changedType:Changed RETURN changedType

concept.description: Adds a label 'Affected' to all test classes having a dependency to Java types which were changed by commits in the current Git branch.
concept.cypher: MATCH hierarchy=shortestPath((changedType:Type:Changed)-[:EXTENDS|IMPLEMENTS*0..]-(type:Type)) WITH type, hierarchy WHERE all(t in nodes(hierarchy) WHERE (:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(t)) WITH type MATCH (testArtifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(testPackage:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(test:Class), (test)-[:EXTENDS|IMPLEMENTS*0..]->(:Test:Class)-[:DEPENDS_ON*0..1]->(type:Type) WHERE NOT (exists(test.abstract) and test.abstract) SET test:Affected RETURN testArtifact as Artifact, collect(distinct test) as Tests

concept.description: Reports all test classes affected by commits in the current Git branch.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Maven:Project)-[:CREATES]->(artifact:Artifact) OPTIONAL MATCH (artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(test:Affected:Test) RETURN artifact as Artifact, collect(test) as Tests

constraint.description: Public methods of Java types that changed in the last Git commit are not covered by test methods (experimental).
constraint.cypher: WITH split({testImpactAnalysisGapMethodVisibility},",") as visibilities MATCH (type:Changed)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method) WHERE not method:Constructor and method.visibility in visibilities and not (:Test:Method)-[:INVOKES]->(method) WITH type, collect(method) as Methods MATCH (artifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type) RETURN artifact as Artifact, type as Type, Methods

constraint.description: Public methods of Java types that changed in the current Git branch are not covered by test methods (experimental).
constraint.cypher: WITH split({testImpactAnalysisGapMethodVisibility},",") as visibilities MATCH (type:Changed)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method) WHERE not method:Constructor and method.visibility in visibilities and not (:Test:Method)-[:INVOKES]->(method) WITH type, collect(method) as Methods MATCH (artifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type) RETURN artifact as Artifact, type as Type, Methods
